proposal1.heroHeadline: Unlock Your Team's Potential: Automate Proposal Writing Instantly
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Experience a 90% reduction in proposal time with our AI automation system.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Six systemic issues affecting your growth and engineering bandwidth right now.

problems.title: Manual Proposal Overload
problems.description: Crafting each proposal manually consumes valuable time and resources, delaying client engagement and reducing potential revenue streams.

problems.title: Inconsistent Proposal Quality
problems.description: Variability in proposal content and quality can affect client trust and perceived professionalism, impacting conversion rates.

problems.title: Resource Drain on Development
problems.description: Technical teams are often diverted from core projects to assist with proposal creation, leading to a backlog in development work.

problems.title: Limited Scalability
problems.description: As your client base grows, the current manual process cannot scale efficiently, risking missed opportunities and client dissatisfaction.

problems.title: Delayed Response Times
problems.description: Lengthy proposal preparation times lead to slower response rates, potentially losing clients to faster competitors.

problems.title: Lack of Data-Driven Insights
problems.description: Without an automated system, there's limited ability to track proposal success metrics, hindering continuous improvement efforts.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Five integrated workstreams covering every dimension of transformation.

solutions.title: Automated Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Leverage AI to create high-quality, customized proposals in seconds.

solutions.title: Quality Assurance
solutions.description: Ensure consistent and professional proposals with built-in quality checks.

solutions.title: Data Analytics Integration
solutions.description: Gain insights into proposal performance with advanced analytics.

solutions.title: Scalability Solutions
solutions.description: Easily scale your proposal operations as your business grows.

solutions.title: Rapid Response Optimization
solutions.description: Reduce response times and enhance client engagement with faster proposals.

metrics.label: Higher portal adoption with modern UX

whyUsCards.title: Open Source First

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery and Architecture
process.description: Audit existing systems, map integrations, and define technical architecture.

process.title: Design and Prototype
process.description: Create wireframes and prototypes for user feedback and iteration.

process.description: Develop core features, integrate third-party services, and ensure compliance.

process.title: Testing and Optimization
process.description: Conduct thorough testing and optimize for performance and security.

process.title: Launch and Support

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transforming Acme Corp's Digital Experience Into a Growth Engine
proposal2.heroSubheadline: A structured engagement plan for website redesign, product UX, and ongoing digital performance. Built for where you are heading.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Six friction points costing your business growth, trust, and engineering bandwidth right now.

problems.title: Brand and Product Disconnect
problems.description: Your website communicates reliability, but your product interface tells a different story.

problems.title: Inconsistent User Experience
problems.description: Visitors struggle to navigate your site, leading to frustration and drop-offs.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Responsiveness
problems.description: Your site isn't optimized for mobile users, causing lost opportunities.

problems.title: Lack of Local Visibility
problems.description: Potential clients can't find you online when searching for local services.

problems.title: Ineffective Advertising Spend
problems.description: Current ad campaigns aren't yielding the desired ROI.

problems.title: Outdated Content Strategy
problems.description: Your content isn't engaging or reaching your target audience effectively.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Four integrated workstreams designed to address every problem area identified above.

enriched.positioning: Personal, responsive service from a small, expert team
serviceList: Local SEO & Google Business Profile Management
valuePropositions: Personal, responsive service from a small, expert team
Custom solutions tailored to each business, never templates
Results-focused strategies that support real business goals
Ongoing support and proactive website care
differentiators: Woman-owned, local agency with deep Kelowna roots
Direct access to a small, skilled team (no passing between departments)
Focus on education, transparency, and honest pricing
Custom, non-templated solutions and proactive support
Clients retain full ownership and control of their digital assets

lead.personalization:
Urban Roots Interior Design has built a strong reputation in Kelowna for delivering thoughtfully designed interiors that blend modern aesthetics with sustainability. Your team has grown steadily through word of mouth and repeat business, and you‚Äôre now looking to attract new clients‚Äîparticularly higher-value commercial projects‚Äîthrough a stronger online presence. You‚Äôve invested in branding and have a basic website, but you‚Äôre ready to take things to the next level.

With competition increasing in the local interior design market, you‚Äôve identified the need for a more polished, user-friendly website and a robust digital marketing strategy. Your goals include increasing website traffic, generating more qualified leads, and establishing Urban Roots as a top-rated choice for interior design in Kelowna and the Okanagan region. You‚Äôre seeking a partner who can provide both strategic guidance and hands-on execution, freeing up your team to focus on client projects.
lead.painStatement:
Currently, Urban Roots‚Äô website is visually appealing but lacks the structure and optimization needed to convert visitors into inquiries. The site does not rank well for key local search terms, making it difficult for prospective clients to find you when searching for interior designers in Kelowna. There is limited tracking in place, so it‚Äôs hard to know which marketing efforts are working, and you‚Äôve noticed that competitors are appearing more prominently in Google searches and local directories.

Additionally, your team is stretched thin, and managing digital marketing in-house has become unsustainable. You‚Äôre missing out on opportunities to showcase your best work, capture leads from Google Ads, and engage your audience consistently on platforms like Instagram. Without a proactive partner, it‚Äôs challenging to keep your web presence current and competitive.
